label: Book ID
desc: A unique Identification number for each book.

label: Book Title
desc: The name under which the book was published.

label: Authors
desc: Names of the authors of the book. Multiple authors are delimited with -.

label: Average Rating
desc: The average rating of the book received in total.

label: ISBN
desc: Another unique number to identify the book, the International Standard Book Number.

label: EAN
desc: A 13-digit ISBN to identify the book, instead of the standard 11-digit ISBN.

label: Language
desc: Helps understand what is the primary language of the book. For instance, eng is standard for English.

label: Pages
desc: Number of pages the book contains.

label: Ratings
desc: Total number of ratings the book received.

label: Reviews
desc: Total number of written text reviews the book received.

label: Publication Date
desc: Date when the book was first published.
